channel.title: How to cahnge stats of a weppon?
channel.description: I have weps in my "scapé" but I want to change stats, into a KO wep. but dont know how. So can you guys help ?

item.title: How to cahnge stats of a weppon?
item.dc:creator: @fallen_angel666 fallen_angel666
item.description:
@fallen_angel666 wrote:

i can help, go to your item CFG, (you will need to select “open with” and then open with notepad) use CTRL + F and search the item u want and change the second number from the end (last number is prayer bonus, next to it is strength.)

Read full topic
item.source: How to cahnge stats of a weppon?
